title: Secure File Share
subtitle: Securely share files with end-to-end encryption

upload.title: Upload File
upload.dropzone: Drag & drop a file here, or click to select

step1.title: 1. Secure Upload
step1.description: Files are processed using a secure upload protocol with client-side encryption. Each file is chunked and encrypted using AES-256-GCM before transmission.

step2.title: 2. Token Generation
step2.description: A cryptographically secure token is generated using a combination of UUID v4 and additional entropy. This token serves as both an access key and decryption key.

step3.title: 3. Secure Download
step3.description: Files are streamed during download with real-time decryption. The process uses a secure WebSocket connection for reliable transfer and progress tracking.

securityNote.title: Advanced Security Note
securityNote.description: Our system implements a zero-knowledge architecture where files are encrypted before leaving your browser. The server never has access to unencrypted data, and encryption keys are derived from the access token using PBKDF2 key derivation. All temporary data is securely wiped from memory after transfer completion.
